sentences.sentence: Lampedusa's citizens protest ahead of a visit by EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen to the island on the front line of Europe's migration crisis.

sentences.sentence: Authorities in Libya investigate the collapse of two dams which caused deadly floods in the eastern city of Derna.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: President Zelensky's announced an international arms production forum in Ukraine as NATO allies grapple with supplying Kyiv's demand for weapons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Volunteers hoping for a cleaner future around the world sift through trash and pick up litter for World Cleanup Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Lampedusa, the small island off Sicily, has long been on the front line in Europe's migration crisis. L'isola di 20 km quadrati ha deciso che non può più essere il punto su cui un fenomeno di questo tipo può essere scaricato e la cui popolazione deve subire un impatto sulla propria vita e sulle dinamiche del proprio territorio che orm now lasted for 30 years. The EU president's been invited by Italy's Prime Minister Giorgio Maloney, who has this week proposed a naval blockade of North Africa to stop the flow of boats run by people traffickers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Maloney's described the migratory pressure on Italy as unbearable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Libyan authorities have opened an investigation into the collapse of two dams which caused catastrophic floods in the eastern city of Derna, leaving more than 11,000 dead and thousands missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Conditions in the city are bleak and aid groups are warning of a second humanitarian crisis as disease looks to spread.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: crisis as disease looks to spread. There is a risk to have a waterborne disease when we have stagnating water, but this risk is not caused by the dead bodies that might be in the streets. There is no risk of contamination from the dead bodies, but you can have other diseases like cholera that can happen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Shipments of international aid began to arrive on Saturday, offering a lifeline to thousands despite dwindling hopes of finding more survivors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Earlier this week, the UN said a lack of adequate warning systems meant the floods caused many preventable deaths.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The arms manufacturers displaying their wares in London this month are being invited to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: President Zelensky has announced an international defense industries forum inviting scores of companies from 21 countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: While demand is clearly there, supply is becoming a challenge for NATO allies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Now we see that we're giving away weapons and at the same time we are ordering new ones and they are not in balance so so that's why we the call to the industry and the government's to have a more intense debate and a higher sense of urgency to solve the problem. Ukrainian military footage from Avdika near Bakhmut shows just how urgent the need for guns and ammunition is to those on the front line.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Both sides claim to hold what's left of this village as they fight over every square metre of an obliterated landscape.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Doing their bit in the war against waste.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In Paris, volunteers took to the streets armed with bin bags and litter pickers, giving up their afternoon in hope of a tidier neighborhood on World Cleanup Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In Romania, teams took the fight outside the city limits to sort through piles of dumped waste left to fester on the side of country roads.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We found everything we could find, clothes, old phones, mannequins for clothes, a lot of sanitary objects.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Unfortunately, we threw the garbage after the construction, as we saw, a lot of plastic, a lot of glass. And it was much the same on Venezuela's ocean beaches, where environment-conscious citizens sifted through waste that had been left or washed ashore.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The program's in its 13th year and has helped treat more than 300 tons of waste worldwide.
